text: Everything You Need To Know About Beyonce's Long - Awaited Return At Coachella From set times to big surprises, we've got the run down. We haven't seen Beyonce on stage in quite a bit. The Queen Bey has been taking some much needed vacation from live performances to rest and tend to her new twins, Rumi and Sir. But thankfully, Mrs. Carter is returning to her rightful place in the spotlight at the 2018 Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival. The singer saddened the Hive in 2017, when she withdrew her headlining position in light of her pregnancy.
